Hej

I’m a digital and analog designer based in Hamburg. Currently Junior Product Designer at digital agency SinnerSchrader, fascinated to learn about a dozen subjects of design craftsmenship, with a great passion for lettering. My guilty pleasure is hoarding tons of art supplies and getting my hands dirty with ink.

Besides my work at SinnerSchrader, I am available for freelance projects. Feel free to contact me. Also visit my Instagramfor recent artworks and impressions.

CVJM Verbindet

Lettering

Letters do not only convey information. Letters live, they spark emotion, and when used correctly, catch a viewers eye at once. Letters are unique pieces of art – thats why they are one of my biggest passions in graphic design. Since many years, I train my knowlegde of the craft to create conveying artworks with soul.

Whether digital work or handwritten sign – I help your business to create unique visual solutions you and your customers will love.

Have a project idea or any questions?
